attributes.action: Recommend Alan Bates, former sub postmaster be knighted.
attributes.additional_details: Alan Bates represents everything good about the British people and the honours system should be used to recognise that.
attributes.background: Alan Bates uncovered one of the largest miscarriages of justice in English history and should be recognised, as should all the other sub postmasters involved.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
